features: DIVINE MOISTURE: Nourish dry skin & send your senses on an island escape with this fast-absorbing, rich & creamy, tropical body lotion. Infused with coconut oil, this blend restores essential hydration to skin.
SMOOTH & HYDRATE: Indulge in this ultra-hydrating blend with coconut oil, tiare essence, & vanilla bean extract. The non-greasy formula absorbs quickly leaving skin feeling soft & smelling great.
BEAUTY PURE & SIMPLE: OGX products are inspired by nature. We don’t try to make hair look “perfect” because we’d rather make hair look fuller, smoother, curlier, or bouncier & smell irresistible.
WHAT HAIR WANTS: Whether you need quenching moisture for curly hair, protection for color treated hair, blowout cream or matte pomade, OGX hair care products are designed to bring out your best.
REAL QUALITY, REAL BEAUTY: Unattainable looks don't inspire us but originality does. OGX hair & skin care product collections are here to help you look your best. We’re beauty, pure & simple.
body.description: Moisturize skin with the ultra-hydrating blend of our coconut oil body lotion Free from parabens and sulfated surfactants, its fast-absorbing, rich formula restores moisture to even the driest skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We approach beauty in our own way, pure and simple. Originality inspires us, that’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability — we approach beauty in our own way. Coconut Miracle Oil Body Lotion 19.5oz Envelop your senses in a tropical escape with this ultra-hydrating body collection enriched with coconut oil, essence of tiare and vanilla bean extract for an island getaway in the shower. With coconut oil, essence of tiare and vanilla bean extract Ultra-hydrating blend Helps restore moisture while enticing your senses with exotic, tropical notes Rich, creamy, tropical blend Leaves skin feeling soft and hydrated

Benefits Ready to be transported to an island getaway? This crafted blend gives you extra moisture while enticing your senses with exotic, tropical notes that leave you feeling as though you’re relaxing in a tropical oasis! Ingredients Restore moisture to even the driest skin and send your senses on an island escape with this fast absorbing, rich and creamy, tropical body lotion. Skin Type This body collection is perfect for skin looking for the ultimate hydration. With a crafted blend that helps give you extra moisture while enticing your senses with exotic, tropical notes. Regimen For best results, use our entire Coconut Miracle Oil collection for the ultimate moisture routine. Get ready to send your senses on an island escape with these fast absorbing, rich and creamy blends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this product for years. I keep it in the shower and smooth it on still-wet skin before getting out. It locks in moisture and has a light, coconut scent. It's not overly heavy or greasy. I don't consider my shower complete without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have been using this lotion for a while now and the smell is amazing! Feels great on the skin and for the price I had to purchase this pack. It’ll last me for a while until I have to repurchase. Love this lotion! (^:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves this — hard to find in stores
reviews.reviewText: Pleasant fragrance, nice moisturizer my son uses it all the time. He’s having trouble finding it at the store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So I purchased this after reading reviews that it is comparable to the popular bum bum cream that is more expensive . So after using both brands I have to say for me it is not comparable to bum bum cream. This lotion is good and smells nice but not as thick as the other cream. It also does not seem as hydrating for me but I do have very dry skin . The price is nice and a fraction of the more expensive brand . Will I finish this bottle - yes. Would I purchase it again? - probably . Would I compare it to bum bum cream ? not a chance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars smells amazing, feels nice
reviews.reviewText: It smells great and the consistency is nice - not too watery or too thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell , softness of my skin
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these products I have the lotion,shampoo,conditioner, body wash they are all fantastic and the smell last forever. With Amazon's prices you can't beat it .Linda

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how light it feels on the skin. And the smell is so good. Kinda similar to Sol De Janeiro’s bum bum cream

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good moisturizer, disappointing smell
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited to use this because I love coconut scents, but I’ll get to that in a second. The product itself moisturizes nicely and isn’t greasy, but takes a second to rub in on damp skin. If putting on dry skin, it rubs in just fine. I felt it made my skin really soft and helped any dryness. As for personal preference, this doesn’t smell good. In the bottle, it smells REALLY good and has that amazing coconut scent but rubbed into the skin, I swear to God, it smells like tobacco-scented perfume. I cannot stand the smell and I wish I hadn’t purchased this. My husband felt the same way when he smelled it in the bottle versus on skin. I’ll finish this and top it with coconut body oil, but I definitely won’t repurchase.
Me encantó, no queda grasosa y seca rápido.Huele muy rico entre vainilla y coco.
Amo su olor incluso después que te quitas la ropa queda con olor bien rico.
La crema no es la mejor en el mercado pero si es buena! Huele muy rico, hidrata aunque siento que no se absorbe tan facil y me hace sudar la piel

reviews.reviewTitle: Huele delicioso e hidrata muy bien.
reviews.reviewText: Compré está crema más que nada porque huele delicioso, pareciera que traes perfume puesto. Pero también hidrata sin dejarte la piel grasosa. Eso sí, si no eres fan de las cremas un poco pesadas, no te la recomiendo mucho. Pero si no te molesta, está increíble
El aroma es muy rico en la botella pero ya puesto en la piel noc,, en mi piel se vuelve muy sinteticoy uele raro
